author: enki_0042
title: For the Fans
review:
If you owned an original Classic Space set as a child, you would understand why this is an absolute "must have" 30 years later.

Only one problem with the helmet - the original classic space helmets (white, red, yellow or bue) did not have visors and the bronze non-transparent visor therefore looks totally out of place. However, this is easy to fix - it's not glued to the rest of the figure like everything else...
